Package io.micronaut.tracing.brave

@Configuration @Requires(classes={brave.opentracing.BraveTracer.class,brave.Tracing.class}) package io.micronaut.tracing.brave
Configuration for Brave tracing.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher
